description: Modifies the specified attribute of the specified instance.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Modifying instance attributes can involve changing account settings to maintain access to the instance, including the use or creation of default, local, or cloud accounts.
This API call could disable or modify security tools and defenses on the instance, impairing the system's ability to detect or respond to threats
Modifying instance attributes could allow the hijacking of resources for unauthorized uses such as cryptocurrency mining. You could also increase the size of CPU or RAM
Changes in instance attributes could be used to facilitate the destruction of data on the instance, impacting the integrity and availability of information.

securityImplications: Attackers might use ModifyInstanceAttribute to change configurations of EC2 instances or overwrite the user data of an EC2 instance to have it execute malicious commands when the instance starts.
